channel.title: How do You hack a client?
channel.description:
How do you hack a client…? Because I want to hack one that has screenshot, file, tools, hp above head, forums. The reason why I want to hack a client is because I never had client myself and the one I got here has my client but it’s jacked up…and I really need you guy’s help hack a client. =0 it would be really helpful if you post link or type how I am supposed to do it...
Thanks, Colgi

item.title: How do You hack a client?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:8, topic:200870”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=265476.msg2197257#msg2197257 date=1208575687]

public void hackClient
{
hackclient();
}

You’d need a void for that;
Here is one kay;

public voud hackclient() if hackclient = true; ableToHackClient = true; else if hackclient = false; deleteItem(hackableClient, 1); }
Yah idc if its wrong bovvvveeeerrrd

[/quote]
u 4got its else if not if or ese u get errers :eek: [/quote]
Amg wellll sooooory

Read full topic
item.source: How do You hack a client?
